title: vAsudEvam upAsmahE
sahitya:
vAsudEvam upAsmahE vasudEvAtmajam harim


anupallavi

 vAsavAdi dEva jAla vandita vaikuNTha padam dAsa janAnAm abhISTa dAyakAmbhOja padam


caraNam   kanakAnga mArishESam kapaTa dashAkrti vESam ananta vEda ghOSam apagata rAgadvESam ghana 
kaustubha maNi bhUSam gambhIra mrdu bhASam vanajAsanAdi pOSam vara guruguha santOSam
